name: Sawn lumber, hardwood, rough, green, at sawmill, SE
description:
Allocation based on mass.
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology. Some data extrapolated from similar processes.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Questionnaires from 12 mills from the 8 states of southeast region.  Hardwood sawmills were members of the Hardwood Manufacturer Association (HMA).
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: Only mass allocation factors are available for the multi-functional processes (disregard economic allocation factor values-they are mass allocation factors).
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: SE = Southeast United States.  The 8 states are Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, Tennessee, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia.

exchanges.description: oven-dried weight. Green lumber, wood specific gravity of 0.528 and  85%MC dry basis ; 1.45m3 rough green lumber =1 m3 planed dry lumber

flow.name: Sawn lumber; hardwood; rough; green; at sawmill

exchanges.description: weighted for 5 mills that reported value

flow.name: Disposal, solid waste, unspecified, to inert material landfill

exchanges.description: Wood specific gravity of 0.558 and 100%MC dry basis weight of the bark; bark is used both as fuel (49%) and mulch (51%)

defaultProvider.name: Roundwood, hardwood, green, at logyard, SE

flow.name: Hogged fuel; hardwood; green; at sawmill

exchanges.description: 20% of mill use for onsite  transportation
Oven-dried weight. 100%MC dry basis; roughly half of bark is burned for fuel (49%) and the rest is for mulch (51%)
Oven-dried weight. sawdust =30%, hogged fuel= 43%, bark =27%.

flow.name: Wood fuel; hardwood; green; at sawmill

exchanges.description: Wood specific gravity of 0.528 and 85%MC dry basis weight of the wood

defaultProvider.name: Roundwood, hardwood, green, at logyard, SE

exchanges.description: weighted for 4 mills that reported value

flow.name: Wood chips; hardwood; green; at sawmill

exchanges.description: 20% of mill use for onsite  transportation; proxy for propane
